name: Duelist
description: The Duelist is a cunning and agile humanoid warrior known for its finesse in combat, typically wielding a rapier with great speed.
memorable: The Duelist excels in one-on-one combat, utilizing quick strikes and evasive maneuvers with its mobility abilities.
goals: To outmaneuver opponents, deliver swift strikes, and avoid direct confrontation when possible.
relations: Often seen alongside other agile or cunning combatants.
environment: Commonly encountered in urban settings or dense shadowy areas where it can utilize its mobility.
strengths: High agility enhances evasion and attack accuracy; special abilities allow it to negate opportunity attacks.
weaknesses: Sunlight Sensitivity causes disadvantage on attacks and perception checks in sunlight.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with a rapier and venomous dagger, dealing piercing damage and applying poison.
most_powerful_ability: Riposte allows the Duelist to counterattack with advantage after being missed by a melee attack.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive perception of 14.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, making it highly competent in maneuvering and evading detection.
additional_information: Duelist's Mobility grants advantage on avoiding opportunity attacks.
Fey Ancestry provides advantage against being charmed and immunity to magical sleep.
Can vanish into shadows with Shadow Traveler for tactical repositioning.
Multiattack variant allows for increased damage output in a single turn.

agile humanoid using finesse in battle
duelist with poison attack and evasive maneuvers
lawful evil warrior skilled in acrobatics
